Title: Longines 14K Gold Case 17J Convex Crystal Hooded Lugs Wristwatch 8 1/4" /RUNS

Description: Longines 14K Gold Case 17J Convex Crystal Hooded Lugs Wristwatch 8 1/4" /RUNS Longines 14K Gold Case 17J Convex Crystal Hooded Lugs Wristwatch 8 1/4" /RUNS Longines 14K Gold Case 17J Convex Crystal Hooded Lugs Wristwatch 8 1/4" /RUNS Click to Enlarge Click to Enlarge Click to Enlarge Click to Enlarge Click to Enlarge Click to Enlarge Click to Enlarge Click to Enlarge Click to Enlarge Click to Enlarge Click to Enlarge Click to Enlarge Description: You Are Bidding On: Longines 14K Gold Case 17J Convex Crystal Hooded Lugs Wristwatch 8 1/4" /TICKS- This is a Men's 14Kt Yellow Gold Case Longines Swiss 17 Jewel Wristwatch that is running and seems to be keeping time but please note we are selling the watch AS IS/NO WARRANTY/ PARTS OR REPAIR. The Watch is Rectangular in shape, has a Convex Crystal & Hooded Lugs. There is a Subsidiary Sweep Hand. **One of the hour hands has turned dark.The Longines Dial is in very nice condition with Arabic Numerals. *The Crystal does have some scratches but not too bad for the age of the watch. The Watch has a Black Band but I could not find a stamp on the band so I do not know what it is made of. **The Movement Is Stamped: Longines Watch Co. Swiss Seventeen 17 Jewels Unadjusted (9L) 7569942**The Inside Back Case Is Stamped: Longines Wittnauer Watch Co. Inc. New York Geneva Montreal K & E 14K 777614** The Outside Back Case Is Stamped: K & E 14KNICE!! SEE PICTURES!!FLAT RATE SHIPPING & HANDLING IN THE CONTINENTAL US IS $6.95 CONDITION: This item was previously owned and used. There is typical markings/wear from use. Please view all photos and read entire description prior to purchasing. THANKS FOR LOOKING! GOOD LUCK! RETURNS Contact Seller Within 14 Days After Receiving The Item If You Are Not Satisfied. Refund will be processed upon receipt of the returned item and the return shipping fee will be at the buyer’s expense. All items are sold AS IS. ABOUT US For over 60 years now, Arthur Yates and Son Jewelers has been a full service jeweler specializing in Certified Diamonds and pre-owned watches. We are also committed to providing the best value in fine estate jewelry, estate diamond engagement rings, and quality jewelry and watch repairs. From our humble beginnings as a simple watchmaker with just one showcase in 1947, Arthur Yates has always been a trusted tradition in South Tampa. Over the next 50 years, we outgrew five locations between Henderson Blvd. and Plant High School. Throughout this period we have maintained a standard of outstanding personal service coupled with unwavering integrity. Today, the founding father’s two sons, Ron and David Yates, and their partner Dan Rodda, are carrying on the family tradition of old-fashioned customer service. Now, as always, you can count on Arthur Yates & Son Jewelers for all of your fine jewelry needs ce Shipping : Item will be shipped within 24 hours of payment receipt (excluding Saturdays, Sundays and Holidays. As the seller we reserve the right to choose any shipment method through any carrier unless the buyer specifies which carrier/method they would prefer and pays any and all fees for the shipment. Seller is not responsible for the item during shipment, if shipping insurance is desired, please notify us as soon as possible. Local, in-store pickup is also available if you live nearby. Our store is located at 1708 S. Dale Mabry Hwy Tampa, Fl 33629. Payment : Please make payment within five days of auction ending. We accept PayPal. inkfrog terapeak
